title: Fashion Shopping Mall Dressup v34.0.0 mod
description:
Stylish kids, get ready to discover Beauty salons, Clothing stores , Fashion Boutiques,Celebrity Make up sets, a bakery & many Restaurants! 

Come on Boys and Girls, its going to be FUN!
Play Fashion Shopping Mall Now! 
Build & Discover your own mall story for free! 

Features: 
* PLAY OFFLINE! No internet connection required
* BUILD up from a tiny boutique to the worlds biggest Mall!
* 2 FREE Funny Fashion crazy Mini games to enjoy!
* DAILY FREE GIFTS to send to your friends & family! 
* UNLOCK tastier and more complex recipes as you level up! 
* EXPLORE, EXPAND and Decorate your favorite Shopping Mall just the way you want it!
* SHOPAHOLICS keep on playing, to Enjoy fantastic fashion adventures. 

The Story
Fashion Shopping Mall opened their gigantic doors to all fashion crazy girls and boys. Everyone enjoyed shopping there. It has innovative designs, luxurious restaurants even an entertainment area for those little ones. 
The nasty Mall boss from Nowhere land, came to destroy the ones famous shopping mall, he burnt down everything , there was nothing left. He stole all the money, but the most important thing that would hurt everyone deeply was the Blueprints. He stole all blueprint and flew away in his helicopter. A sad day for all shopaholics. As we clean up all the rumble, we found one blueprint. Wow fantastic news, come on lets rebuild more clothing shops, restaurants, beauty and accessories stores. 

Just a small peak in what awaits you! 
Come on let's explore together! 
Come on take a look into our Handbag boutiques! 
Celebrity handbags in every store! 
Luxurious evening wear bag store 
Be the most elegant clutch maker
Dress up your puppy in a cute doggie bag
Decorate your handbag boutique and sell it to all it girls. 

Make your customers happy by building more: Beauty Salon, Spa & make up stores! 
Build your own beauty castle. 

My Friends HELP us rebuild Fashion Shopping Mall to be the biggest fun house again.
Download now its Free! 
See you all soon in the game and don't forget to come and visit my Mall.

Unlimited Coins
Unlimited Hearts
